text:
A bit about my day yesterday!
*I worked:* from 8AM to 9PM (with a cuople hours off in the afternoon)
*I worked on:* a few calls with potential clients (pitching my business & talking about their problems)
*My colleague gave me feedback:* saying I am good at thinking about the bigger picture of everything we do
*I'm learned:* a bit about how to build dynamic websites in my spare time
*I'm felt:* pretty unstressed yesterday! And productive :smiley:

Here's my day today:
*Today I worked:* from 9AM to 1PM and then from 4PM until probably 10PM tonight! :alarm_clock:
*Today tasks / activities I worked on:* I applied to a grant and sent a proposal I'd promised to sent to a potential customer (good to send things on time and deliver as you promised to!)
*Today my colleague gave me feedback:* saying I wrote concisely in the grant application and made our business sound amazing to potential investors!
*Today I'm learning / reading:* I continued doing a bit of an online course about how to build dynamic websites + read some of a business book by LinkedIn co-founder Reid Hoffman
*Today I'm feeling (stress levels):* Pretty chilled :facepunch::smirk: Feeling like getting good traction with the business and hard work is paying off (finally!)
